title: Owner of the adjoining plots may be permitted with their mutual consent to group the subsidiary ground floor buildings, such as outhouses, stables, privies etc
clause_text: Owner of the adjoining plots may be permitted with their mutual consent to group the subsidiary ground floor buildings, such as outhouses, stables, privies etc. along the common boundary in the rear of their plots provided that such building shall be at a distance of not less than 10 feet from any other building in the compound. The minimum floor area of any room intended for human habitation shall be not less than 120 sq.ft.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
